law.text: The county clerk shall permit any citizen, at all reasonable hours, to inspect or make copies of any registration record, without any fee. He shall, upon request, furnish to any person a copy of the registration records, for which he may charge necessary duplicating costs not to exceed fifty cents ($0.50) per page.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 7, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 9, effective June 21, 1974.
